name: Qbit
description:
Qbit is a short and fun platformer game in which you play as an interdimensional cube named Qbit. Help Qbit defeat evil ghosts and reach the finish line!

The game consists of 7 main levels with an easy to moderate difficulty level.

CONTROLS: LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS: Use these keys to move.

UP ARROW KEY: Use this key to jump.

DOWN ARROW KEY: While standing on a platform, use this key to fall down.

*Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

*Sound effects from www.bfxr.net
